content: in hours, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | terrainClearanceFuel | `'number'` | The additional fuel required for terrain clearance during flight operations, in kilograms.| | terrainClearanceFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the additional fuel required for terrain clearance during flight operations, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | onBoardFuel | `'number'` | The estimated weight of the fuel already present on board the aircraft prior to refueling or flight plan fuel calculation, expressed in kilograms.| | onBoardFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalence of the fuel already on board the aircraft at the time of flight plan preparation, expressed in hours, minutes, and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | taxiFuel | `'number'` | Fuel quantity during ground taxi operations, in kilograms.| | taxiFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the fuel quantity during ground taxi operations, in hours, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | tripFuel | `'number'` | Fuel quantity required for the en route segment of the flight excluding taxi fuel, reserves, and contingency fuel, in kilograms.| | tripFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the fuel quantity required for the en route segment of the flight, excluding taxi fuel, reserves, and contingency fuel, in hours, minutes, and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | takeOffFuel | `'number'` | Total fuel quantity onboard the aircraft before takeoff after taxi excluding reserved fuel amount for the return leg of the flight, in kilograms. | | takeOffFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'` | The time equivalance of the total fuel quantity onboard the aircraft before takeoff after taxi excluding reserved fuel amount for the return leg of the flight, in hours, minutes and seconds (hh:mm:ss) format.| | blockFuel | `'number'` | Total fuel quantity onboard the aircraft at the beginning of the flight, in kilograms.| | blockFuelTimeEquivalance | `'duration'`
